item.title: 随着数据市场的发展，故宫博物院推出私人股票价格
item.description: 纳斯达克私募市场有限责任公司（Nasdaq Private Market LLC）公开发布了一款针对私募公司的专有定价产品，加入了竞争日益激烈的潜在 IPO 候选公司数据领域。【原文：Nasdaq Private Market LLC is publicly launching a proprietary pricing product for private companies, joining an increasingly competitive space for data on potential IPO candidates.】

item.title: 谷歌赢得英国对其 YouTube 短裤品牌的商标裁决
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌赢得了一场保留 YouTube Shorts 品牌名称的法律诉讼，避免了在全球范围内重新命名其流行短视频格式的可能性，该格式的竞争对手是 TikTok 和 Instagram Reels。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google won a legal battle to keep the YouTube Shorts brand name, avoiding a potential global re-branding of its popular short videos format rival to TikTok and Instagram Reels.】

item.title: 货币交易商为全球波动性激增做好准备
item.description: 在下周对冲美元走势的成本攀升至2020年初以来最昂贵的水平后，交易员们正准备应对全球货币波动的激增。【原文：Traders are preparing for a surge in currency volatility around the world after the cost of hedging dollar moves over the next week climbed to the most expensive since early 2020.】

item.title: 消费者持续消费，万事达卡盈利超出预期
item.description: 万事达卡公司（Mastercard Inc.【原文：Mastercard Inc. reported profit that beat analysts’ estimates, helped by a boost in cross-border transactions.】

item.title: 需求居高不下，挪威邮轮公司再次上调业绩展望
item.description: 挪威邮轮公司（Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd.）今年第四次上调了利润预期，原因是市场对邮轮航行的需求仍然很高，这打破了人们对休闲旅游业增长放缓的担忧。【原文：Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. boosted its profit outlook for a fourth time this year as demand for sailings remains high, defying fears a slowdown in the wider leisure travel industry.】

item.title: 用户持续增长，Roblox 业绩超出预期
item.description: 视频游戏平台 Roblox 公司公布的第三季度预订额超出了分析师的预期，因为该游戏平台的用户数量和使用时间都在持续增长。【原文：Video game platform Roblox Corp. reported third-quarter bookings that beat analysts’ expectations as the gaming platform continues to grow its users and the time they spend there.】

item.title: 乌克兰央行在美国大选前维持利率不变
item.description: 乌克兰央行将利率稳定在 13%，因为这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的决策者们正在评估通胀压力，并为下周的美国总统大选结果做好准备。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank held interest rates steady at 13% as policymakers in the war-battered nation gauge inflationary pressure and brace for the results of next week’s US presidential election.】

item.title: 豪华红海度假村公司到 2030 年将再斥资 270 亿美元
item.description: 这家在红海沿岸开发豪华度假村项目的沙特开发商预计到 2030 年将再斥资 270 亿美元，推进旨在吸引更多游客到沙特旅游的开发项目。【原文：The Saudi developer of luxury resort projects on the Red Sea coast expects to spend another $27 billion by 2030 to push ahead with developments that are designed to draw more tourists to the kingdom.】

item.title: 大亨计划斥资 7.2 亿美元推进东非水泥投资项目
item.description: Amsons 集团计划在坦桑尼亚建造一座价值 3.2 亿美元的水泥厂，如果竞购 Holcim AG 旗下的一家肯尼亚制造商成功，还将向该公司投资 4 亿美元，从而扩大其在东非的业务。【原文：Amsons Group plans to build a $320 million cement plant in Tanzania and will invest a further $400 million in a Kenyan manufacturer owned by Holcim AG if its bid for the company is successful, growing its presence in East Africa.】

item.title: 新兴市场有望以亏损结束动荡的十月
item.description: 10 月份，新兴市场货币、债券和股票下跌，波动性飙升，原因是在美国大选前全球收益率上升、美元走强的情况下，投资者急于为风险较高的资产重新定价。【原文：Emerging-market currencies, bonds and stocks have declined while volatility surged in October as investors rushed to reprice riskier assets amid rising global yields and a stronger dollar before US elections.】

item.title: 瑞穗将与主权财富基金 PIF 共同推出沙特阿拉伯 ETF
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团与沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金公共投资基金（Public Investment Fund）建立了合作伙伴关系，并计划推出投资于中东国家股票的交易所交易基金。【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. has formed a partnership with Saudi Arabian sovereign wealth fund Public Investment Fund, and plans to launch an exchange-traded fund that invests in the Middle Eastern nation’s stocks.】

item.title: Global Switch 探讨以 20 亿美元出售英国业务股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Global Switch Holdings Ltd. 正在探索出售其英国业务的大部分股权，交易价值可能约为 15 亿英镑（19.5 亿美元）。【原文：Global Switch Holdings Ltd. is exploring the sale of a majority stake in its UK business, which could be valued at about £1.5 billion ($1.95 billion) in a deal, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: KKR 的 200 亿美元目标考验投资者对收购基金的胃口
item.description: 私募股权投资先驱 KKR & Co.公司正在测试，在两年多的低迷交易挤压了整个行业的回报率之后，投资者是否仍然对这一资产类别情有独钟。【原文：Private equity pioneer KKR & Co. is testing whether investors still crave the asset class after more than two years of sluggish dealmaking squeezed returns across the industry.】

item.title: Peloton 聘用福特高管担任首席执行官，领导扭亏为盈工作
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司任命福特汽车公司高管彼得-斯特恩（Peter Stern）为下一任首席执行官，委托他领导这家长期陷入困境的健身公司实现扭亏为盈。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. named Ford Motor Co. executive Peter Stern as its next chief executive officer, entrusting him to lead a turnaround of the long-struggling fitness company.】

item.title: 马克-扎克伯格不再谈论 Meta 的选举计划
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格过去喜欢在财报电话会议上谈论选举。现在不会了。但首先...【原文：Mark Zuckerberg used to love talking about elections on earnings calls. Not anymore. But first...】

item.title: 奥运提振康卡斯特销售额和利润超预期
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）公布的第三季度销售额和利润超过了分析师的预期，因为该公司的 NBC 部门从夏季奥运会中获得了提振，奥运会带来了 14 亿美元的广告收入。【原文：Comcast Corp. reported third-quarter sales and profit that exceeded analysts’ expectations after the company’s NBC division got a lift from the Summer Olympics, an event that generated $1.4 billion in advertising revenue.】

item.title: Y Combinator 的卢瑟-洛威（Luther Lowe）为初创企业提供了自己的特区代言人
item.description:
在帮助领导初创企业反对加州人工智能法规的斗争之后，这位科技政策资深人士又有了新的斗争目标。【原文：

After helping lead startups’ crusade against California AI regulation, the tech policy veteran has new fights to pick.

item.title: 特姆公司遭欧盟调查可能销售非法产品
item.description: 欧盟已对电子商务平台 Temu 展开调查，调查该公司是否采取了足够措施打击其网站上的非法产品销售。【原文：The European Union has launched an investigation into e-commerce platform Temu and whether the company is doing enough to combat sales of illegal products on its site.】

item.title: 大型石油公司认为巴西将成为全球主要的清洁航空燃料中心
item.description: 全球都在推动航空旅行去碳化，从大型石油公司到主权财富基金，都把赌注押在巴西，希望它能成为全球顶级的绿色航空燃料中心。【原文：A global push to decarbonize air travel has groups from Big Oil to sovereign wealth funds betting on Brazil to become a top global center for green jet fuel.】

item.title: SoftwareOne 指导性目标下调后股价跌至历史新低
item.description: SoftwareOne Holding AG 股价暴跌，原因是该软件公司下调了指导目标，并报告收入低于预期。【原文：SoftwareOne Holding AG shares tumbled after the software company cut guidance and reported lower-than-expected revenue.】

item.title: 优步发布节假日预测，利润创历史新高
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. reported weaker-than-expected ride bookings and issued a middling forecast for the holiday quarter, even as it delivered record operating profit.】

item.title: 中国经济放缓，消费者缩减开支，大型啤酒制造商受到冲击
item.description: 中国市场信心和需求的下滑打击了全球最大的两家啤酒生产商的啤酒销售。【原文：A slump in confidence and demand in China has hit the sale of beer at two of the world’s largest brewers.】

item.title: 随着西班牙交易判决的临近，BBVA 和 Sabadell 在竞争问题上发生冲突
item.description: BBVA SA 和 Banco Sabadell SA 就拟议中的对这家较小银行的收购是否会损害西班牙银行服务的提供发生了冲突，而此时距离西班牙竞争管理机构做出决定仅有数周时间。【原文：BBVA SA and Banco Sabadell SA clashed over whether the proposed takeover of the smaller lender will hurt the provision of banking services in Spain, just weeks before the country’s competition authority is set to weigh in.】

item.title: 市场疲软，香港水下抵押贷款创 22 年新高
item.description: 由于香港房地产市场持续低迷，香港超出房屋价值的抵押贷款额跃升至二十多年来的最高水平。【原文：The value of mortgages in Hong Kong that have exceeded the worth of the homes jumped to the highest level in more than two decades as the city’s property market continues to struggle.】

item.title: 梯瓦因打压竞争对手被欧盟罚款 4.63 亿欧元
item.description: Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd.被欧盟反垄断监管机构处以近 4.63 亿欧元（5.03 亿美元）的罚款，原因是该公司不公平地诋毁了竞争对手的一家多发性硬化症药物生产商，从而阻碍了公平竞争。【原文：Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd. has been fined nearly €463 million ($503 million) by the European Union’s antitrust watchdog for thwarting fair competition by unfairly disparaging a rival maker of a multiple sclerosis drug.】

item.title: 贸易商竞相争取泰晤士河水务公司的应急资金
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）正试图从债权人那里获得一笔紧急资金，债务交易商们正在提高他们对这笔资金的出价，这也表明了这些条款对投资者的吸引力有多大。【原文：Debt traders are upping their bids for pieces of the proposed emergency funding Thames Water is trying to secure from creditors, in a sign of how attractive the terms are to investors.】

item.title: 让华尔街胆战心惊的图表
item.description: 岌岌可危的市盈率："我们正处于 S&P 500 指数现代史上第三高的估值水平，仅次于 1999/2000 年和 2021 年。约翰-汉考克投资管理公司（John Hancock Investment Management）联席首席投资策略师艾米丽-罗兰德（Emily Roland）说："如果这种估值上扬的趋势持续下去，那么前瞻性回报的吸引力将大打折扣。【原文：Sky-high stock valuations, super-concentrated markets and the US government’s enormous interest bill — here are the charts spooking investors.Precarious P/E: “We are at the third-highest valuations on the S&P 500 in modern history only behind 1999/2000 and 2021. If this valuation upside continues, it leaves forward-looking returns less compelling,” says Emily Roland, co-chief investment strategist for John Hancock Investment Management.】

item.title: 国际清算银行退出普京吹捧的跨境支付项目
item.description: 在俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）认定数字跨境支付的基础技术是规避制裁和潜在破坏美元的工具之后，国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）将退出该项目。【原文：The Bank for International Settlements is leaving a project for digital cross-border payments after Russia’s president Vladimir Putin identified the underlying technology as a tool to circumvent sanctions and potentially undermine the dollar.】
